items.name: Uyo Art & Culture Hub
items.short_description: A vibrant center showcasing contemporary Nigerian art, hosting workshops, and cultural performances in a modern, engaging space. Opened in 2021.
items.address: 12, Ewet Housing Estate Road, Uyo, Akwa Ibom

items.name: Splash & Play Family Park
items.short_description: Uyo's newest family entertainment park featuring thrilling water slides, a laser tag arena, and arcade games for all ages. Opened its gates in 2022.
items.address: Off Ikot Ekpene Road, near University of Uyo Annex, Uyo

items.name: The Gourmand's Grotto
items.short_description: An upscale food court and lounge offering a diverse culinary experience from local delicacies to international cuisines, coupled with live music evenings. Established in 2020.

items.name: Green Oasis Botanical Garden
items.short_description: A serene botanical garden showcasing indigenous flora, featuring winding walking trails, a butterfly garden, and peaceful picnic spots. Opened to the public in 2019.
items.address: Adiabo Road, Off Oron Road, Uyo, Akwa Ibom

items.name: Zenith Grand Convention Centre
items.short_description: Uyo's premier event venue, boasting state-of-the-art facilities for conferences, exhibitions, and grand social gatherings. Officially launched in 2023.

items.name: Innovate Uyo Hub
items.short_description: A collaborative space for tech enthusiasts and entrepreneurs, offering co-working facilities, coding bootcamps, and open innovation workshops. Established in 2021.

items.name: Signature Mall & Arcade
items.short_description: A vibrant lifestyle mall combining premium retail stores with a state-of-the-art entertainment arcade and a modern cinema complex. Opened in 2022.
items.address: Oron Road, near NIPOST, Uyo, Akwa Ibom

items.name: The Serene Haven Wellness Centre
items.short_description: An exclusive wellness retreat offering holistic spa treatments, invigorating yoga classes, and tranquil meditation gardens for ultimate relaxation and rejuvenation. Established in 2020.

items.name: Akwa Ibom Heritage House
items.short_description: An interactive museum celebrating the rich history and vibrant culture of Akwa Ibom people, using modern digital exhibits and immersive storytelling. Inaugurated in 2023.
items.address: Uyo-Ikot Ekpene Road, By Ring Road 3, Uyo

items.name: Uyo Adventure Arena
items.short_description: An exciting indoor adventure park featuring climbing walls, trampolines, obstacle courses, and mini-golf, perfect for active fun and parties. Opened in late 2022.
